TopicTitle: Forgot mod which upgrade resource panel, so it will show remaining delta-v

Articles.Content: Hi! In 1.0.0. i was using sweet mod that uprgare resorce panel so it shows remaining delata-V, ETC remaing charge and other. Could you help me to remeber what was its name?
I found what i was looking for -  KSP Alternate Resource Panel  . But it's curently doesnt work with 1.1. Author promised to update soon.
